data.message:
Eminem i love you you gave me a reason to live your music helped me when nobody else gave a flying fuck and even had the decency to listen to me probably becuse im an unstable emotinal 17 year old (born june 17th 98) (we're both born on the 17th so cute even though your born October 1972) and i have autisum and a whole bunch of randomized problems i cant explain and im a female so everyone tells me it's just hormones the assholes em you've helped me though more than i could explain and you music was even with me when i almost died inside you even helped me though that cutie i love you so much em ❤ i buy all your CD's listen 2 you all day I've seen all you interviews music vidios performances and so forth your perfect in every way i love you so much and always will 💙 and you sound great your gifted i could see it the second i first knew your music and your blue eyes are stunning you've taken great care of your physical body aswell your awsome 💙💚❤
ps paul if u are reading this Hi hope your doing ok bye homies
